JobTitle: Software Development Senior Principal Engineer – Cloud & Analytics
JobFullDesc: Senior Principal Software EngineerJoin Dell and you’ll work in a dynamic environment with other motivated, talented individuals who inspire greatness in their teammates. Our unique position as a technology leader ensures that you’ll always be challenged in your work and supported in reaching your most ambitious goals. Role OverviewDell Client Software’s Analytics & Cloud Solutions team is looking for a Senior Software Development Engineer with proven track record of delivering enterprise level cloud services, data management and analytics solutions. In this role, you will be responsible for working closely with other technologists, architects, experience design engineers, product marketing and software engineers to define the architecture, explore technology alternatives and implement those solution with focus on efficiency and reliability.Role ResponsibilitiesWorking with external partners and internal Dell technology, marketing and engineering teams to define and architect solutions related to Digital Delivery, Web Services, telemetry and analyticsIdentifying and working with software and hardware partners to assess cloud technologies and roadmaps for inclusion in future solutionsBeing the technical expert and resource for the overall cloud solutions, data management and/or analyticsPerforms analysis and design for medium-sized to large or complex development and maintenance projectsPossesses and applies advanced knowledge of technology principles, best practices, and procedures to the completion of complex software development assignmentsDevelops complex code and configuration data using secure coding practicesEnsures that all code, configuration data, and system documentation is accurate, complete, understandable, and adheres to company standardsAddress security vulnerabilities by using tools to assure security, analyze outputs, and recommend corrective actionsRequirementsDemonstrated comprehensive knowledge of tools/technologies including: C#/C++, ASP.NET MVC, AngularJS, SQL Server, Service Bus, Active Directory, Web Apps, Entity Framework, Stored Procedures, Java, JavaScript, CSS, HTML, JSON, AJAXExtensive experience working with IaaS and PaaS systems (Microsoft Azure, Amazon Web Services etc)Deep functional knowledge or hands on design experience with Web Services (REST, SOAP, etc.) is needed to be successful in this positionDeep understanding of cloud computing infrastructure and platforms specifically Azure (Azure stack – Azure event hubs, Azure streaming analytics, Azure Data Lake Store, Azure Data Warehouse, Azure Databricks, Azure Functions, Azure Automation, Azure Data Factory, Powershell, Virtualization technologies like Kubernetes)Experience with relational and non-relational databases such as SQL, TSQL, MongoDB etc.A clear understanding of cloud service and deployment modelsExperience working on or leading agile development teams (ideally leveraging Scrum or Kanban) A software development or DevOps automation background is a big plusExperience working on a team delivering a customer facing productPreferencesBSCS, BSEE, BSCE and 15+ years of relevant experience or MSCS, MSEE, MSCE and 12+ years of relevant experienceExperience with Jenkins, Hudson, Bamboo, TeamCity, and other Continuous Integration toolsUnderstanding the git source control system like GitHub, Stash etc.Familiarity with Continuous Integration/Deployment toolsStrong understanding of software development lifecycle and product development lifecycleExposure to frameworks and patterns such as MVC/MVVM/MVP, Data Warehousing, WCF, WPF, Service Bus, MSMQ, Python , PowerShell is a plusHere’s our story; now tell us yoursDell Technologies helps organizations and individuals build a brighter digital tomorrow. Our company is made up of more than 150,000 people, located in over 180 locations around the world. We’re proud to be a diverse and inclusive team and have an endless passion for our mission to drive human progress.What’s most important to us is that you are respected, feel like you can be yourself and have the opportunity to do the best work of your life -- while still having a life. We offer excellent benefits, bonus programs, flexible work arrangements, a variety of career development opportunities, employee resource groups, and much more.We started with computers, but we didn’t stop there. We are helping customers move into the future with multi-cloud, AI and machine learning through the most innovative technology and services portfolio for the data era.
